episode_event_academy_ch0245_ch0148_ch02:
Marnie, those alterations to your uniform are
so cool!
Right? I’m really likin’ what I did with it!

I based it on some recommendations from my
Galar friends and folks here on Pasio.

I’m sure to get good marks if I wear this while
studyin’!
For sure! I get so hyped when I wear my uniform!
Altering your uniform to make it one of a kind...

At my school in Paldea, some students were able
to show off their individuality, just like Team Star!

I did try changing up my accessories, like hats
and bags...

But I didn’t do anything drastic like alter my
uniform.
Wanna give it a try?

Changing your uniform can make a big difference
in how you feel!

Yeah, sounds fun! Maybe we can alter them
together sometime?

And take our partner Pokémon out for a ride
around Pasio, too!
Nice! It’s a promise!

I’ll have to practice with Cyclizar to get even
better at riding her!

I sure was shocked when I met Typhlosion in a
space-time distortion.

Thanks for helping me out with that, Akari.
I couldn’t have done it without you!
No problem!

You already had Typhlosion secured by the time
we got there, anyway!

I guess what else could I expect from a Gym
Leader who specializes in Ghost-type Pokémon!
*chuckle* Thanks!

Ever since I met Typhlosion and started learning
more about Hisuian Pokémon...

I’ve been thinking about how exciting it can be to
meet an unfamiliar Pokémon! It never gets old,
no matter how many years go by!

As a teacher at Pasio Academy, I want to teach
everyone the joys of learning.

I’m also wearing this outfit to get folks interested
in Johto culture.

I’m hoping my students can learn more about Johto
and Ghost-type Pokémon—even just a little!

I’d love to learn about a region I never knew
before!
Sure! You’re welcome to take my class!

Typhlosion and I will be waiting for you, so come
anytime!

Starting at a new school is so exciting! It’s like
starting an adventure, isn’t it?
Yeah!

Of course, it can be scary starting over in an
unfamiliar place...

But it’s also fun because you might encounter
something new!
Totally!

For example, even if you took two different
lessons about the same Pokémon...

You could still get a fresh take and learn
something new, because Pasio and Paldea folks
have different opinions and teaching methods.

To compare it to Pokémon battling, it’s like when
you’re forced to change up your moves and
strategies.
I can relate to that...
It’s tough, but it’s more than just that.

Overcoming a challenge can give you a feeling of
accomplishment. That’s what makes taking on
something new so fun!

We’re both learning in a land unknown to us,
so that’s something we have in common! I think
we’ll get along just fine!
Yup!

From now on at Pasio Academy, we’ll gain new
knowledge and experience...

and have fun seeing how many friends we
can make!
Hm... The facilities are all in order.
And I don’t see any issues with the curriculum.

You’ve been going around inspectin’ the academy
a lot lately, huh?

Haven’t you loads of other things to do?
You gonna be OK spendin’ this much time
at the academy?
Hmph! Your concern is unnecessary!
My other tasks have settled down, is all!
Really? But—

That aside, tell me! Have you experienced any
inconveniences during your time at the academy?
Huh? Well... I guess nothing comes to mind.
Heh. Good to know.

Hmm... Come to think of it, did the library have
enough books?
Excuse me. I must go now! Hahahahaha!

Well, he seems to be enjoyin’ himself...
But is he really OK?

His retainers said he has so much to do, he hasn’t
had much time to rest.

I guess he’s keen on checkin’ out the academy in
person, even if he IS busy.
I’ve gotta be just as dedicated!
